tool_description: An API on top of PhonePe Pulse Data APIs
name: PhonePe Pulse Plus
title: PhonePe Pulse Plus

api_list.name: Get Top States/Districts/Pincodes for Transactions

optional_parameters.name: state
optional_parameters.description:
Specify State to narrow down results to a particular state.

Allowed values -

andaman-&-nicobar-islands
andhra-pradesh
arunachal-pradesh
assam
bihar
chandigarh
chhattisgarh
dadra-&-nagar-haveli-&-daman-&-diu
delhi

lakshadweep

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://phonepe-pulse-plus.p.rapidapi.com/district-wise/user/maharashtra/2021/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "phonepe-pulse-plus.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://phonepe-pulse-plus.p.rapidapi.com/district-wise/user/{state}/{year}/{quarter}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "phonepe-pulse-plus.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
